snippet: Banks have complained that they sometimes have to pay for a costly Bloomberg terminal just so an employee can use its chat service.
abstract: Largest banks on Wall Street are teaming up to join messaging service network that will allow finance industry employees to find and chat with one another quickly, service that will challenge important part of Bloomberg's terminal business; banks have complained that they sometimes have to pay for a costly Bloomberg terminal just so an employee can use its chat service.
lead_paragraph: Banks have complained that they sometimes have to pay for a costly Bloomberg terminal just so an employee can use its chat service.

headline.main: Chat Service Aims to Challenge Bloomberg
headline.print_headline: Chat Service Aims to Challenge Bloomberg
